Name: The Cleaner
About the game: The Cleaner is a hardcore die 'n' retry inspired by John Wick, Hotline Miami and SuperHot. You control a highly-trained ' cleaner ' with a unique power. No clich√© storyline, no cutscenes, start the game and play. Die, and don't be afraid to die. The Cleaner will put you through a challenge. One bullet is enough to kill you, so use your power of slowing down time to kill your ennemies. Reloading ? Never heard of it, you rather just borrow your victims weapons. Good luck !
